title: Rock Creek Park: Carter Barron Amphitheatre
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Carter Barron Amphitheatre               Carter Barron Amphitheatre        Carter Barron Amphitheatre, Rock Creek Park logo             2016 Schedule Please join us for summer shows at Carter Barron Amphitheatre and Fort Dupont to celebrate the National Park Service Centennial.        Accessibility  Carter Barron is accessible with assistance Directions: The Carter Barron Amphitheatre is located at 4850 Colorado Avenue, NW,  Washington, DC  20011, near the intersection 16th Street and Colorado Avenue.     ^  Driving    ^  Public transportation (Metro) Rules For safety please review these simple rules. History  Explore how Carter Barron Amphitheatre was created in Rock Creek Park and find out who some of the early performers were. CONTACT US  Add your email address to the Carter Barron Email List. Email questions for the Carter Barron or   write to: Carter Barron Amphitheatre Rock Creek Park  3545 Williamsburg Lane, NW Washington, DC 20008 Phone: 202-895-6000
